Eurostar Las Claras

Salamanca deserves to be toured on foot. Calmly. And without missing a thing. From the Plaza Mayor to the Roman Bridge. And to do so, nothing better than a modern hotel located in the old part of this Human Heritage city, considered by many the most beautiful city in Spain. That is the proposal made by the Eurostars Las Claras, an establishment that boasts an unsurpassable location, situated 2 minutes walking the Covent of St. Stephen and erected on the site which in olden times was the vegetable garden worked by the nuns of the Convent of St. Clare: from where our name stems from.

The Eurostars Las Claras has 72 spacious, well-lit rooms and excellent possibilities for high level accommodation: 4 premium rooms, 7 junior suites and 3 presidential suites. These are modern rooms with regard to their amenities and classical in terms of style.
